Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1077.jpg'}
{3: 'Ding-a-ling... The sound of bells rings out from somewhere at the festival, while vendors call out to passing crowds.'}
{3: 'As dusk settles and the sky darkens, you spot an unassuming stall at the corner of the street. Neon letters flash brightly above its sign: "Balloon Shooting: Hit More, Win More".'}
{3: 'Old-fashioned air rifles are lined up next to a wall of balloons. Just looking at it stirs an urge to take on the challenge.'}
{3: 'You both speak at the same time, your voices overlapping.'}
{3: "Noticing Watanabe glance unconsciously toward the stall, you realize you're thinking the exact same thing."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Looks like we had the same idea. Want to give it a try together?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Perfect.', 3: '16', 4: '(Nod without a word)', 5: '16'}
{3: 'The shooting stall is manned by a surveillance robot, apparently without a voice module. Seeing you two approach, it silently hands each of you a rusted vintage air rifle.'}
{3: "You take the gun, flick off the safety, load a round, and aim, just like you're used to."}
{3: 'The rubber bullet veers off wildly in the wrong direction.'}
{3: 'You go to try again, only to realize the gun is already empty. The robot silently points up at the neon sign above its head.'}
{3: 'Only then do you notice the fine print below the sign: "First shot free. Each additional shot costs two festival coins. Hit a balloon to earn a free bullet."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'These old guns were probably rebuilt from scrap. No wonder the trajectory is a mess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Still, that's pretty standard for festival stalls. A little trickery's part of the game.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rather than put him off, the unfair setup seems to fire Watanabe up. He slaps two festival coins on the counter and picks up another rifle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Try aiming a little more to this side...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe moves behind you, arms loosely wrapping around your waist, guiding your right hand into a slightly downward angle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And when you fire, let your shoulder absorb a bit of the recoil...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His broad hand rests on yours, gently coaxing your finger toward the trigger.'}
{3: 'Taking the hint, you adjust your aim as he showed you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ready... three, two—', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Pull the trigger)'}
{3: 'A faint popping sound follows, and the small balloon bursts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Robot Vendor', 3: '...(silently claps, then hands over a new bullet.)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Nicely done. Looks like your training at F.O.S. College paid off.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'One eye is covered by his hair, but the grin tugging at the corner of his mouth and the pride in his voice are impossible to miss.'}
{2: 'So, do I get a prize?', 3: '55'}

{3: "A simple, offhand question is all it takes to shake the calm composure of the white-haired Construct in front of you. His smile fades, replaced by a surprisingly serious look, as if he's genuinely troubled by the question."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What... kind of gift would you like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sorry. I don't really have anything on me that would make a proper gift... If you're okay with it, I can give you the prize from this shooting game.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, it's a deal.", 3: '62', 4: '(Tease him a little)', 5: '64'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then I'll have to do my best and win you the best prize they have.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nope. I want something better.', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then... I'll do my best and win you the top prize at this stall.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lets go of your wrist, takes a small step back, and lifts his own rifle.'}
{3: "From here on, it's a total sweep."}
{3: 'Together, Watanabe and you burst every balloon in a single run. The stall owner reluctantly hands over the top-shelf prize, then "politely" asks you two to leave.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'The top prize turns out to be a huge broccoli plush. Its fluffy top is styled like hair, and its thick green stalk features two stubby black eyes that squint at you two with a silly grin.'}
{3: 'Carrying something that large makes walking awkward, so Watanabe suggests you rest a while. The two of you, and the broccoli, sit down on a nearby bench.'}
{3: 'He sits beside you, gently fingering the tag on the back of the plush toy. As he speaks, his tone turns thoughtful.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This broccoli plush was originally made by a well-known toy brand during the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'There were others in the set too—tomato, carrot, corn... Apparently, the idea was to help kids get over being picky eaters.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You know a lot about this kind of thing.', 3: '82', 4: 'So kids back then actually got to complain about what they ate.', 5: '82'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yeah. Sounds like a luxury, doesn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Still... I wouldn't mind living in that kind of time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He slowly presses down on the plush\'s "<color=#ff4e4eff>:)</color>" smile, crumpling it into a wrinkled mess.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If I had the choice, I\'d want the children of Oasis to grow up like that too, to be able to say "no" to food they don\'t like.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've solved most of the food shortage issues, but it's still a long way from what I hope for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As the leader, there's still a lot I need to do.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As he speaks, he notices that you've gone quiet. He stops kneading the plush's face, lifts his head, and looks you in the eye."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But I'm not worried about whether it will really happen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Because you're here, 【kuroname】. Someone who believes in what I'm trying to do. And because you believe... I do too. I believe that future is coming. Soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've already done everything we need to. Now we just wait for the seeds to sprout.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'In time, all good things will come our way, right?', 3: '97'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Next time you're free, come visit Oasis.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Setting aside the green plush toy, he takes your hand in his.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's been a long time since your last visit... I'd like to show you how much the camp has changed since then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "And besides, you're always the one inviting me to festivals. I think it's my turn now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'His fingers tighten slightly around yours. The warmth of his palm spreads through your hand, hot enough to almost sting.'}
{3: 'The golden eyes fixed on you reflect the flickering, dappled glow of the streetlights.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, where should we meet next time?', 4: '1'}
